Welcome to BlogCFC5

Apr 13

posted by Raymond Camden in BlogCFC | 0 Comments

Welcome to the first entry on my development blog for BlogCFC5. This is very much a work in progress, so please execuse any oddities or bugs you may encounter.

This entry was written under Alpha 0. At this time, I do not want bug reports or even suggestions. I'm just sharing the site as kind of a "sneak peek".

Want to take a look at the code? There is now a public SVN repository here:

svn://199.231.128.19:8000/blogcfc5

But please knote that there are no updated instructions or database install scripts. I will not be supporting you if you run with this edition. My plan is to offer real support during the beta.

Anyway, enjoy!

This entry was posted on April 13, 2006 at 2:33 PM and has received 822 views. There are currently 0 comments. Print this entry.
